document.full_text: the republican-dominated missouri legislature forced through a redistricting plan on wednesday that democrats complained hurts their election chances, overriding a veto by democratic governor jay nixon.
document.title: missouri republicans force through redistricting plan
lines_and_colors: the republican-dominated missouri legislature forced through a redistricting plan on wednesday that democrats complained hurts their election chances, overriding a veto by democratic governor jay nixon.
